text: Eberhard Schlotter (June 3, 1921 – September 8, 2014) worked as an international painter in Spain and Germany. He is the brother of the sculptor Gotthelf Schlotter (1922–2007). Schlotter was born in Hildesheim, eldest son of the sculptor Heinrich Schlotter, was private at the Second World War, studying later on in Munich. In 1955, he made acquaintance with Arno Schmidt - which resulted in many pictures of the famous novelist and the village he lived in, Bargfeld. He died in 2014 at Altea, Alicante, Spain. == Further reading == * Heidi Roch-Stübler/Günther Flemming: Eberhard Schlotter. Malerei 1941-1986, Darmstadt 1987. * Eberhard Schlotter und Arno Schmidt.
